verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מִיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> time רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> And it came to pass a long אַ֠חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הֵנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> had given rest יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> from all their enemies מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> that Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2205><s%> aged בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> in age

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel לִזְקֵנָיו֙ <S%H2205><s%> [and] for their elders וּלְרָאשָׁ֔יו <S%H7218><s%> and for their heads וּלְשֹׁפְטָ֖יו <S%H8199><s%> and for their judges וּלְשֹֽׁטְרָ֑יו <S%H7860><s%> and for their officers וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am זָקַ֔נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> unto them I am old בָּ֖אתִי <S%H935><s%> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> in age

וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> and you רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> And ye have seen אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> your God לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> unto all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> because כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of you for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַנִּלְחָ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> [is] he that hath fought לָכֶֽם׃

רְאוּ֩ <S%H7200><s%> Behold הִפַּ֨לְתִּי <S%H5307><s%> I have divided לָכֶ֜ם אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> unto you by lot these nations הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <S%H7604><s%> that remain הָאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> to be an inheritance לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7626><s%> for your tribes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> from Jordan וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> with all the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִכְרַ֔תִּי <S%H3772><s%> that I have cut off וְהַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> even unto the great מְב֥וֹא <S%H3996><s%> the setting הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun

וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יֶהְדֳּפֵ֣ם <S%H1920><s%> he shall expel מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> them from before וְהוֹרִ֥ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> you and drive אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִלִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> them from out of your sight וִֽירִשְׁתֶּם֙ <S%H3423><s%> and ye shall possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> their land כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> hath promised יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God לָכֶֽם׃

וַחֲזַקְתֶּ֣ם <S%H2388><s%> courageous מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> Be ye therefore very לִשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep וְלַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to do אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכָּת֔וּב <S%H3789><s%> all that is written בְּסֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> of the law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> you may not סוּר־ <S%H5493><s%> that ye turn מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> not aside therefrom [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> or [to] the left

לְבִלְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> so בוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> That ye come בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> not among these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <S%H7604><s%> these that remain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> among וּבְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> of the name אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H430><s%> of their gods לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or תַזְכִּ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H2142><s%> among you neither make mention וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or תַשְׁבִּ֔יעוּ <S%H7650><s%> nor cause to swear וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעַבְד֔וּם <S%H5647><s%> [by them] neither serve וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or תִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> them nor bow לָהֶֽם׃

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God תִּדְבָּ֑קוּ <S%H1692><s%> But cleave כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you עֲשִׂיתֶ֔ם <S%H6213><s%> as ye have done עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וַיּ֤וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3423><s%> hath driven out יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from before גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> nations גְּדֹלִ֣ים <S%H1419><s%> you great וַעֲצוּמִ֑ים <S%H6099><s%> and strong וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָ֤מַד <S%H5975><s%> hath been able to stand אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> but [as for] you no man בִּפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> you unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> One מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> at יִרְדָּף־ <S%H7291><s%> of you shall chase אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַנִּלְחָ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> he [it is] that fighteth לָכֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> for you as he hath promised לָכֶֽם׃

וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8104><s%> heed מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> Take good לְנַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> therefore unto yourselves לְאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> that ye love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שׁ֣וֹב <S%H7725><s%> Else if ye do in any wise תָּשׁ֗וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> go back וּדְבַקְתֶּם֙ <S%H1692><s%> and cleave בְּיֶ֙תֶר֙ <S%H3499><s%> unto the remnant הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> of these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֥ים <S%H7604><s%> [even] these that remain הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> among וְהִֽתְחַתַּנְתֶּ֥ם <S%H2859><s%> among you and shall make marriages בָּהֶ֛ם וּבָאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> with them and go in בָּהֶ֖ם וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like בָּכֶֽם׃

יָד֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> Know תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> for a certainty כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> will not יוֹסִ֜יף <S%H3254><s%> will no more יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God לְהוֹרִ֛ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> [any of] these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִלִּפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> from before וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֜ם לְפַ֣ח <S%H6341><s%> you but they shall be snares וּלְמוֹקֵ֗שׁ <S%H4170><s%> and traps וּלְשֹׁטֵ֤ט <S%H7850><s%> unto you and scourges בְּצִדֵּיכֶם֙ <S%H6654><s%> in your sides וְלִצְנִנִ֣ים <S%H6796><s%> and thorns בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> in your eyes עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until אֲבָדְכֶ֗ם <S%H6><s%> until ye perish מֵ֠עַל <S%H5921><s%> off הָאֲדָמָ֤ה <S%H127><s%> land הַטּוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> from off this good הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לָכֶ֔ם יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I הוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> I [am] going הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And behold this day בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth וִידַעְתֶּ֞ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye know בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶ֣ם <S%H3824><s%> in all your hearts וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשְׁכֶ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> and in all your souls כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָפַל֩ <S%H5307><s%> hath failed דָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> thing אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> that not one מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> things הַטּוֹבִ֗ים <S%H2896><s%> of all the good אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֜ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> concerning you all are come to pass לָכֶ֔ם לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> hath failed מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thing אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> unto you [and] not one

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> are come עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> things הַטּ֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Therefore it shall come to pass [that] as all good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> promised יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> upon you which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> you כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> so יָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> bring יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> you so shall the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> off אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> things הָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> upon you all evil עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַשְׁמִיד֣וֹ <S%H8045><s%> until he have destroyed אוֹתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> מֵ֠עַל <S%H5921><s%> off הָאֲדָמָ֤ה <S%H127><s%> land הַטּוֹבָה֙ <S%H2896><s%> you from off this good הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לָכֶ֔ם יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

בְּ֠עָבְרְכֶם <S%H5674><s%> When ye have transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִ֨ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֮ <S%H430><s%> your God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded אֶתְכֶם֒ <S%H853><s%> וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <S%H1980><s%> you and have gone וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7812><s%> and bowed לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְחָרָ֤ה <S%H2734><s%> be kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> yourselves to them then shall the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּכֶ֔ם וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H6><s%> against you and ye shall perish מְהֵרָ֔ה <S%H4120><s%> quickly מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> off הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> from off the good אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which he hath given לָכֶֽם׃ פ
